message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to both of us, with an estimated worth of $10000. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending you an offer to purchase it directly from me at a special price of $9500. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive price. I believe this offer presents an excellent value proposition for you. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.
